Commentary: sloppy fielding from deep third man. Another boundary. Tharanga might send Bangladesh a thank-you note later. Short of a length and attached with width outside off, the SL captain cuts it firmly towards third man. The fielder runs around, dives, and lets the ball through his hands

Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, 2 runs

Commentary: shot. Overpitched outside off, only 128ks, Danushka lays into it. Pinged off the middle of the bat. Punched to the left of the bowler and to the right of mid-on
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: Three men follow the swirling ball on the leg side. Mushfiq, who has the big gloves, calls for it. Runs after the ball, tumbles, and pouches it safely. This was the cutter again from Mashrafe. Hip-high cutter, going away outside off, 118ks. Danushka does not spot the change-up again. He pulls early and splices the ball over square leg. Mushfiq completes a brilliant catch with the sun squinting into his eyes
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, OUT
Dismissal_text: MD Gunathilaka c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mashrafe Mortaza 9 (10m 11b 1x4 0x6) SR: 81.81

Tharanga dares to rush across to the other end. Mahmudullah, though, attacks the ball and nails a direct hit at the bowler's end

Commentary: Sri Lanka have reviewed an LBW decision. S Ravi took a long, long time to raise the finger. Maybe they've gone up just because they thought the umpire wasn't certain. The appeal was a very strong one from the bowler and keeper. This is a length ball coming in from wide of the crease, Chandimal walks across the stumps to help it over short fine but is struck in front of the stumps. There was certainly no bat. The ball was in line with the stumps and would've hit middle and leg
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, OUT
Dismissal_text: LD Chandimal lbw b Mustafizur Rahman 24 (53m 30b 1x4 0x6) SR: 80.00

Commentary: just imagine how hard this must have been hit if the bowler had enough time in the world to run back few steps after being hit hard on his followthrough and then complete the catch. Full, Kusal backed away and picked the bones out of it. Taskin is hit on the left shoulder but the ball pops up. For a second, he isn't sure where the ball is, but recovers, looks up, regains his composure and then runs back to complete the catch.

Dismissal_text: BKG Mendis c & b Taskin Ahmed 102 (164m 107b 9x4 1x6) SR: 95.32

Commentary: Mushfiq effects a direct hit and runs out Thisara. The square leg umpire raises his finger. Leg-stump ball, Thisara can't put bat on ball. Grazes the pad and rolls behind to the keeper. Thisara probably thinks it has passed the keeper and strays out of the crease, looking to get to the other end. He has to undo his steps. Mushfiq, removes his right glove, hunts the ball down, and over-arm throws it onto the stumps at the striker's end
Commentary_short: Mashrafe Mortaza to NLTC Perera, OUT
Dismissal_text: NLTC Perera run out (†Mushfiqur Rahim) 9 (4m 6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 150.00

Commentary: length ball outside off, Asela smites it over the man at deep square leg. We saw plenty of these in Australia. Flat, powerful hit, for the second six of the day. Mashrafe conceded only 30 off his first eight overs. The last two cost 25

Commentary: banged short and outside off, upper-cut away over Mushfiq's head for four

Commentary: very full and wider than a set of stumps outside off Taskin asks the batsman to reach out. Carved up and over the covers

Commentary: short cutter, 117ks, grips in the surface, Dilruwan reaches out outside off and stabs it back to the bowler

Commentary: Mushfiq effects another direct hit, this time he under-arms it onto the striker's end. Dilruwan premeditates by venturing a long way across the off stump. Mustafiz pushes a yorker wide past him. Dilruwan misses it and searches for a bye. He can't get back in time. The ball might have brushed the pad. Mushfiq swoops down on the ball and boom! He has had a great day with the big gloves
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to MDK Perera, OUT
Dismissal_text: MDK Perera run out (†Mushfiqur Rahim) 9 (9m 8b 1x4 0x6) SR: 112.50

Commentary: wide full-toss wide outside off, might have slipped out of the hand. Off-side wide

Commentary: full-toss really wide outside off, Mustafiz can't nail the yorker. Asela reaches out and simply slices it past backward point. This would have been an off-side wide had Asela left it

Commentary: back of a length cutter outside off, bounces off the surface and defeats the cut

Commentary: Asela holes out to mid-off. Really full and outside off, Asela drives it in the air. Mid-off is inside the circle, Sarkar times his jump well and holds onto a overhead catch

Dismissal_text: DAS Gunaratne c Soumya Sarkar b Taskin Ahmed 39 (61m 28b 4x4 1x6) SR: 139.28

Commentary: two wickets in two balls. Taskin is on a hat-trick. This is an innocuous full-toss on middle, Lakmal swats or rather flaps it away in the air, midwicket dives full-length to his left and grabs a smart, two-handed catch
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Lakmal, OUT
Dismissal_text: RAS Lakmal c Mustafizur Rahman b Taskin Ahmed 0 (1m 1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: Taskin does it. He does a Steve Finn or a Shane Bond. He claims a last-over hat-trick, pulls off a spread-eagled celebration, and sets off on a sprint. Pinpoint yorker, ripping inswinging yorker at 141ks, squeezes under the bat and clatters middle and off. Six wickets in the last five overs
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Pradeep, OUT
Dismissal_text: N Pradeep  b Taskin Ahmed 0 (1m 1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00
